message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you for $1200000. This price reflects not only the current market value but also acknowledges the significant importance this product holds for you. I believe this offer strikes a balance between ensuring a fair return on my investment and providing you with a chance to secure a valuable asset at a price that is competitive yet advantageous compared to its worth to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
